mapper.select: select top 15 Company name,sum(totalprice) sum,count(*) numone from (select row_number() over(order by orderId asc) as rownumber ,* from origene_clones_mirror.dbo.orders) temp_row where rownumber > 0 and OrderDate between #{strtime} and #{outtime} group by Company order by sum desc

select top 15 n.ShipCity name,n.sum sum,f.sum summ from (select ShipCity,sum(totalprice) sum from origene_clones_mirror.dbo.orders where OrderDate between #{time} and #{date} group by ShipCity ) as n left join(select ShipCity,sum(totalprice) sum from origene_clones_mirror.dbo.orders where OrderDate between #{time1} and #{time} group by ShipCity ) as f on n.ShipCity = f.ShipCity order by n.sum desc
select receiveDate name,sum(revenue) sum from origene_clones_mirror.dbo.OrderSaleIncome where receiveDate between #{str} and #{end} group by receiveDate
select sum(totalprice) sum from origene_clones_mirror.dbo.orders where OrderDate between #{staDate} and #{endDate}
select sum(totalprice) sum from origene_clones_mirror.dbo.orders where OrderDate between #{staDateo} and #{endDateo}
